channel.title: Pimps and Preachers
channel.itunes:author: Paul Thorn
channel.description: Paul Thorn is a renowned singersongwriter, folk artist, and former professional boxer. Now, Thorn reveals that he is also a short story author and adds his stories to his list of creative offerings in the Pimps and Preachers podcast series.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Paul Thorn is a renowned singersongwriter, folk artist, former professional boxer, and now a short story author in the Pimps and Preachers podcast series.
channel.itunes:summary: Paul Thorn is a renowned singersongwriter, folk artist, and former professional boxer. Now, Thorn reveals that he is also a short story author and adds his stories to his list of creative offerings in the Pimps and Preachers podcast series.

item.title: Ben Fong-Torres and Huey Lewis
item.itunes:author: Paul Thorn
item.description: Ben Fong-Torres and Huey Lewis discuss Paul Thorn. Features Huey's performance on 'I'm Still Here'.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ben Fong-Torres and Huey Lewis discuss Paul Thorn. Features Huey's performance on 'I'm Still Here'.
item.itunes:summary: Ben Fong-Torres and Huey Lewis discuss Paul Thorn. Features Huey's performance on 'I'm Still Here'.
item.author: billy@paulthorn.com

item.title: Earthquake
item.itunes:author: Paul Thorn
item.description: Paul tells of a 4.7 earthquake in Reno, Nevada.
item.itunes:subtitle: Paul tells of a 4.7 earthquake in Reno, Nevada.
item.itunes:summary: Paul tells of a 4.7 earthquake in Reno, Nevada.
item.author: billy@paulthorn.com

item.title: Turn Left
item.itunes:author: Paul Thorn
item.description: Paul confronts the enemy during a trip to the bank.

item.itunes:summary: Paul confronts the enemy during a trip to the bank.

item.title: Cornelious Arnell Lowe
item.itunes:author: Paul Thorn
item.description: In this installment of Pimps and Preachers, Paul pays homage to Cornelious Arnell Lowe, a local boxer and a lesson in joy
item.itunes:subtitle: In this installment of Pimps and Preachers, Paul pays homage to Cornelious Arnell Lowe, a local boxer and a lesson in joy
item.itunes:summary: In this installment of Pimps and Preachers, Paul pays homage to Cornelious Arnell Lowe, a local boxer and a lesson in joy

item.title: Cowboy Hat
item.itunes:author: Paul Thorn
item.description: A trip to the store to purchase a cowboy hat detours into a much larger experience.
item.itunes:subtitle: A trip to the store to purchase a cowboy hat detours into a much larger experience.
item.itunes:summary: A trip to the store to purchase a cowboy hat detours into a much larger experience.

item.title: Camp Kumbaya
item.itunes:author: Paul Thorn
item.description: In this true story, Paul describes the day the Russians invaded Camp Kumbaya.
item.itunes:subtitle: In this true story, Paul describes the day the Russians invaded Camp Kumbaya.

item.title: Pimps and Preachers
item.itunes:author: Paul Thorn
item.description: In the first edition of Paul Thorn's podcast, he explains how the series got its name and offers a glimpse of the stories to come.
